alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 1:06AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Paulding and western Van Wert Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 105 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ohio City, or 8 miles southwest of Van Wert, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Payne, Convoy, Ohio City, Middlebury, Grover Hill, Willshire, Scott, Melrose, Haviland, Wren, Latty, Broughton, Worstville, Tipton, Glenmore, Cavett, Dull, Abanaka and Briceton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
